body.name: TOTO Drake Two-Piece Elongated 1.6 GPF TORNADO FLUSH Toilet with CEFIONTECT, Sedona Beige - CST776CSG#12
body.stockDetail: Only 4 left in stock (more on the way).

Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 21 mins
features: POWERFUL PERFORMANCE WITH LESS FREQUENT CLEANING - TORNADO FLUSH swirls water in a circular pattern to fully wash the bowl surface. CEFIONTECT is an ultra-smooth glaze that minimizes waste from sticking so that it is easily washed away.
STANDARD HEIGHT FROM FLOOR TO RIM - Standard height is shorter than TOTO's Universal Height for those that prefer not to sit as high.

REDUCE WATER USEAGE WITHOUT SACRIFICE - The 1.6 gallon per flush Drake enables you to save water without worrying about diminished performance. The Drake features a wide 3 inch flush valve and a siphon jet bowl that gets the job done in one flush.

STYLISH AND MODERN DESIGN - Update your oasis with this stylish design that couples well with any bathroom décor. The elongated bowl provides added space for comfort. The toilet fits into 12 inch rough-in installations and has a left-hand trip lever.

COMPLETE YOUR TOILET - Finish your purchase with the addition of a TOTO SoftClose seat or upgrade to a WASHLET bidet seat. Drake tank and bowl with hardware included. Purchased Separately: Wax ring, flange bolts, and water supply lines.
body.description: The TOTO® Drake® Two-Piece Elongated 1.6 GPF TORNADO FLUSH® Toilet with CEFIONTECT® is a beautifully designed high profile toilet. The Drake features TOTO’s TORNADO FLUSH®, a rimless, hole-free design with dual-nozzles that creates a centrifugal washing action that assists in rinsing the bowl more efficiently. This version of the TOTO Drake includes CEFIONTECT®, a layer of exceptionally smooth glaze that minimizes waste from sticking to the ceramic. CEFIONTECT, coupled with TORNADO FLUSH, assists to reduce the frequency of toilet cleanings, minimizing the usage of water, harsh chemicals, and time required for cleaning. This version of the Drake has a left-hand chrome trip lever. The Drake bowl and tank set includes a tank to bowl gasket, tank to bowl hardware, and toilet bolt caps. Additional items needed for installation and use must be purchased separately: wax ring, toilet mounting bolts, water supply lines, and toilet seat.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us At TOTO, we design simple, brilliant, elegant solutions for basic human needs. That means a TOTO bathroom is always more than a routine. It’s a ritual where every innovation, every detail, is designed with you in mind. For over 100 years TOTO has been dedicated to improving lives around the globe through tirelessly designing and engineering products that deliver innovative technology while still maintaining the beauty expected from TOTO. POWERFUL PERFORMANCE, DEPENDABLE CLEAN Drake Two-Piece Elongated 1.6 GPF Toilet The Drake Two-Piece Elongated TORNADO FLUSH Toilet with CEFIONTECT is intentionally designed with cleanliness in mind. The Drake features a rimless, hole-free design with dual nozzles that create a highly efficient centrifugal washing action for better bowl rinse after each flush. With the assistance of the CEFIONTECT exceptionally smooth glaze, waste is minimized from adhering to the surface, helping the toilet bowl to stay cleaner longer. Designed with quality materials to ensure longevity and durability. Available in additional colors and features to maximize benefits and coordinate with all bathroom spaces. Complete the set with a SoftClose seat or upgrade with an electronic WASHLET bidet seat.

Effective, Efficient, and Environmentally Focused Cleaning System Powerful Flushing System Our TORNADO FLUSH flushing system generates 360-degrees of cleaning power that reaches every spot. Advanced Clean Technology Our CEFIONTECT ceramic glaze minimizes waste from sticking to porous ceramic surfaces. Improved Water Spot A large water spot that reduces the places where waste can cling to the bowl. Simplified Cleaning The rimless design eliminates places where waste can build up and makes it easier to clean.

Everything You'll Need to Experience Next-Level Clean Everything you need is within reach! This model will come with both tank and toilet bowl included. Simply purchase compatible seat, installation hardware and wax ring. Elevate your experience by upgrading to one of our TOTO WASHLET Electronic Bidet seats, delivering next-level clean and a pampered spa-like feeling after each use.

Choose the Drake That's Right for You! Newly Designed with Everyone in Mind TOTO's Drake Toilet comes in a variety of options to fit your unique needs and complement your bathroom space. Available in standard or Universal Height, 1.28 or 1.6 GPF, 10 or 12 inch rough-in sizes, and with trip levers located on the left or right side of the tank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor quality in a high priced toilet.
reviews.reviewText: This Toto toilet that was made in Mexico is unacceptable. The tank lid had a black spot in the porcilion, the bowl did not sit level on the floor and the water in the bowl keeps dropping after sitting for awhile. Stay away from Toto especially if it's made in Mexico.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overall best toilet I ever had
reviews.reviewText: It flushes better than any other toilet I had. There are no water marks as in standard toilets. I like the way water comes out of both sides and swirls the water around before it flushes ensuring a clean flush. It is definitely a great value. Toto is the best.
